sugathapala da silwa saha sayiman nawagaththegama ge abhawayan hidi da jana awadhanaya yomuwuye owunge kala shilpamaya hakiyawanta nowa wenath detaya, nawagaththegama ge asammatha samaja charyawata, saha sugathapala da silwa thula tharunayan dutu manussakamataya.

dan pa්rashnaya wanne, ema karanaya ohu pilinoganima, wenath ayatath eya bahara kirimata hethuwak weda, nathahoth wenath pa්radhana tharagakaruweku ho thawath apekshakayan kihipa denekuma ee poronduwa dunnoth eya gotabhaya rajapakshawa kotuwimakata hethuwak weda yannayi.

wishala gal sahitha bim kada wasara 13 k wani keti kalayak thula darshaniya sakalanga purna pinbimak bawata path kirimata dhammika himiyo diwa ra wehesunaha.galapatha maha wihara daham pasala shri kassapa bodhiraja daham pasala yana aayathanayanhida anushasakawaraya lesa menma pradeshiya samithi samagam rasak thulin samajiya mehewarehi niratha wethi.adhikarana amathyanshaya mangin mulu diwayinatama samawinisuru padawiyak da, 2007 okthombar masa 28 wana dina winaya kirthi shri wichithrabhanaka gaurawa namaya sahithawa karmacharya dhurayakin da pidum labuha.

militariye balapamata wiruddha wima wenuwata dimoka්ratik pakshaya thula inna ta්rampge wiwechakayan kale ta්ramp palanadhikaraya sthawara kota obama palanadhikaraye, rusiyawata muhuna dime pilawetha idiriyata genayamin eya uga්rakota wardhanaya kirimata ta්ramp palanayata balakirima sandaha udaw soya keli, mattis saha makmastar wethata hari ganimaya.
gruhashritha sathun wisin yuropiyan wetha owun kisi kalekath nodana siti wasiyak himikara di thibuni.

” mema tharuna jawaya idiriyata paminima mardhanaya kirima magin owun demala janayage nidahas satana yomuwima walakwa demala janaya thawaduratath pidawata pathkirima thamayi mehi anek aramuna.demala janaya nidahase jiwathwima walakwime awashyathawayak shri lanka rajayata atha.” “deshaye anagathaya shishyayan.

eheth shri lanka rajaya eksath jathinge sanwidhanayata koti kriyakarihu 424 dena gana danumdima nisa owuhu andamanda wi atha.

wisheshayenma aya niyojanaya karana galla disthrikkaye ruwathi – gunathi landun wenuwen rupalawanya wadamuluwak menma thawath wishesha wada satahan edina pawathwannath katayuthu yoda thibenawa.kisidu deshapalanika wasiyak laba ganime apekshawen meya sidu nokarana bawata pawasu aya,aa sidukaran yana kriyawan sambandhayen dakwuye mewan adahasak.
adahaswalin thamayi, sanwada godanangenne.
//wade karayo, halapa karayo,// chah...
ma methek dana sitiye na oba asimitha mithya wishwasawala elba sitinnek bawa."
